title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 605.10 - The permit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 605.10 - The permit

State Regulations

The permit shall be in the form prescribed by the
commission and shall issue for a period of one year, subject, however, to prior
termination by the commission if found necessary, and upon payment in advance
of an annual fee as fixed by the commission. No permit for the diversion or use
of canal waters shall issue without the consent of the Commissioner of

Transportation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
605.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
